title: qute: injecting cdi bean in template not working on 2.4.0.CR1
body:
### Describe the bug

When injecting bean in template with latest version of quarkus i get a log of error as mentioned in #20583 

adding the extension `quarkus-spring-di` make it work





### Expected behavior

_No response_

### Actual behavior

_No response_

### How to Reproduce?

see https://github.com/stefanorg/code-with-quarkus

1. ./mvnw clean quarkus:dev -> see errors in console
2. uncomment dependency `quarkus-spring-di` in pom.xml
3. retry point 1 -> see no error
4. hit endpoint http://localhost:8080/hello to a warm welcome

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

2.4.0.CR1
